content: **knitted hat / hipster hat in drops snow the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch and ribbed edge ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ee-762 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm height approx 24-26 cm folded up **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 150-150 g colour 12 light blue or use 103-parrot green /104-cobolt blue / 106-lemonade / 51-powder pink / 105-magenta **needles** drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
